name: Under The Cave (angrboda03)
description:
Under The Cave is a indie game made in two month as a school project for ICAN Lyon, made by the Wisteria Witchcraft group : E.D Alcyd, Titory, Vignals Alexis. 

Depression is like a cave, you can fall into it without even noticing it, and it is your choice to give up or continue moving forward.

Controls Keyboard :

ZQSD - Move

Left Click - Throw the rope

A - Pull the rope toward you

E - Get back the rope

Spacebar - Jump

Escape - Menu

Controls Controller :

Left Joystick - Move

RB - Throw the rope

LB/X - Pull the rope toward you

B - Get back the rope

Y - Action button

Start - Menu

If you like the game you can donnate or subscribe to our channel :   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6TlWhPXdN7ROyeK3Cxx8Qg
